settings.instructions: Test your basic skills with pronouns with this quick quiz.
settings.title: Pronouns Quiz

question.title: Select the correct set of pronouns:
question.quiz: (He/Him) and (she/her) are studying together for a test.

question.title: Select the correct set of pronouns:
question.quiz: Would you like to come to the movies with Michael and (I/me)?

question.title: Select the correct set of pronouns:
question.quiz: (We/Us) students are destined to become great journalists!

question.title: Select the correct set of pronouns:
question.quiz: (She/Her) and (I/me) like to go to local concerts.

question.title: Select the correct set of pronouns:
question.quiz: You and (he/him) will be free to go to the mall after finishing homework.

question.title: Select the correct set of pronouns:
question.quiz: (They/Them) threw a great party, and Alice and (I/me) had lots of fun.

question.title: Select the correct set of pronouns:
question.quiz: The way (him/he) talks to Vanessa and (I/me) is usually pretty rude.

question.title: Select the correct set of pronouns:
question.quiz: (I/me) want to go to the beach with (he/him).

question.title: Select the correct set of pronouns:
Select the correct set of pronouns:
question.quiz: Itâ€™s unclear whether (he/him) and (she/her) are still friends with (we/us).
